attributes.title: DONT EVEN THINK ABOUT IT!!! 😠😠😠😠
attributes.review: not only is trump, your beloved “president”, a homophobic, narcissistic, racist, etc. asshat. he’s a disgrace to the human race. the app though sucked too. naughty pictures of him started getting sent to me after the app asked for my phone number😠 #gross #bleachingmyeyesnow 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I really wanted to be able to express my homophobic, transphobic, racist and sexist “opinions” on this app, but all I got was a nasty virus! It hacked my phone and changed everything to orange (the color of our beloved president) and it renamed all of my folders and usernames to “bunker boy”. Worst app ever 😌💅🏻

attributes.title: NOT user friendly
attributes.review: This app was horrible from the beginning. There’s no way to navigate it and the graphics are just gaudy and obscene! Do not download this app or else you will lose about 59 IQ points!

attributes.title: AWFULL!!!!!
attributes.review: This app deserves 0 stars it’s absolutely horrible it takes days to download and it gives false information that manipulates people and is extremely racist absolutely awful don’t ever download you will regret it

attributes.title: This is awful
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help our country. I was going through the app and started getting texts from a number and they were talking a way Jesus would not approve I truly believe this was mr Cheeto and I say we vote blue

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible do not recommend
attributes.review: It just wasn’t helpful at all and it wiped all my data off my phone it was absolutely horrible I do not recommend at all. It was disgusting do not download.

attributes.title: This was a horrible app.
attributes.review: I can’t believe he would ask for my number like that!!!😤 He is a MARRIED MAN!!🤬I find this absolutely ridiculous.😠What he has done to our country is unforgivable. All jokes aside, we need a better president.

attributes.title: I don’t get it!
attributes.review: I don’t understand why there is an app like this! People can use other more popular apps like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and other things to see some of the latest news.

attributes.title: TRASH APP🤮🗑
attributes.review: Tbh this app was overall the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded. It took weeks to download and then on top of that it took wayyy to much time to log in with and definitely isn’t making America great again😤😤👎🏽👎🏽 1 star ⭐️

attributes.title: I wish I could give negative stars for how poorly this app performed
attributes.review: This app is by far the most abhorrent thing I’ve ever used. Extremely unintuitive. Featured nonsensical information. And it gave my phone a virus. Please please please do not download.
